cannotUpdateError: Can only be updated before game start.
changeColumnsNumber: Click to change number of word letters.
changeRowsNumber: Click to change number of tries.
guessedLettersNotIncludedError: Hard Mode on: your new guess should use all the guessed letters!
howToPlay1: Guess the word in the predefined number of tries.
howToPlay2: Type a guess and press {0} to submit. Each guess must be a valid word in the chosen language. Note: In hard mode, the new guess should include all the letters already guessed.
howToPlay3: After each guess, the color of each letter changes, to show how close to the correct word the guess was. E.g., considering the guess {0} and the solution {1}, the board looks like this:
howToPlay4: Letter {0} exists in the word in this exact position.
howToPlay5: Letter {0} exists in the word but in another position.
howToPlay6: Letters {0} don't exist in the word.
includedLetter: Letter {letter} exists in the word to guess but in another position.
lowLetterNumberError: Only words with {numberOfLetters} letters are valid!
matchedLetter: Letter {letter} exists in the word to guess in this position.
notMatchedLetter: Letter {letter} doesn't exist in the word to guess.
privacyPolicyTerms1: CharMix does not upload, store, use or share any of your data.
privacyPolicyTerms2: The application CharMix neither collects any data nor implies any data collection by third parties or intermediaries. Any data collected when playing CharMix (number of played games, winnings and related game data) will be strictly stored in your browser. The data stored in the browser are containerized, i. e. stored with access restricted to this application, and cannot be accessed by other apps installed on the device.
privacyPolicyTerms3: This Privacy Policy might be updated from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and update the 'Last updated' date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicyTerms4: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacyPolicyTerms5: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us {0}.
shareError: It was not possible to share!
